How to fix the crashing issues on vista and windows7:

1. Start the game up completly
2. Open Task Manager (ctrl+shift+esc)
3. press the "Processes" tab
4. Locate "farminggiant.dll"
5. Right click and press "Set Affinity.."
6. untick all of the options and then och pick one, for example "CPU 0"
7. Press OK and you're ready to go.

This does not however fix the money bug and the game definatly still needs emergency patching
